thread.title: Department of Education apologizes for W.E.B DuBois' error | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Department of Education apologizes for W.E.B DuBois' error | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Department of Education apologizes for W.E.B DuBois' error | Daily Mail Online
text: Government employee is blamed for spelling W.E.B Du Bois' name wrong in tweet and exposing Education Secretary Betsy Devos to ridicule The tweet was sent to pay tribute to W.E.B. Du Bois during Black History Month The African-American icon's name had been spelled 'DeBois' instead of 'Du Bois' It took the department almost four hours to respond to the embarrassing typo On Sunday afternoon, a spokesman said the department is looking into the error The spokesman added a review process is being set up to catch future mistakes Many people, including Chelsea Clinton, mocked the department's blunders Published: 13:27 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 22:24 GMT, 13 February 2017 193 shares
